short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple and secure e-Commerce solution.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A handy extension that ties into, and floats over, the Adilas system, allowing for quick and secure e-Commerce menu creation. Setup is extremely simple, and there is no need to re-create menus elsewhere. Users can also take advantage of the embed code to put the online menu on their own website. 

Orders are immediately sent through to the system; no duplication is necessary. For Colorado operators, an immediate connection to the state MED is also built-in, to check and report purchaser limits. The best feature, however, is the beautiful, easily navigable online menu, which store customers can use on a variety of devices.
